trans-unit.source: The storage technique used within Octave is the compressed column format. It is similar to the Yale format. 9 In this format the position of each element in a row and the data are stored as previously. However, if we assume that all elements in the same column are stored adjacent in the computers memory, then we only need to store information on the number of nonzero elements in each column, rather than their positions. Thus assuming that the matrix has more nonzero elements than there are columns in the matrix, we win in terms of the amount of memory used.
trans-unit.target: Octave中使用的存储技术是压缩列格式。它类似于耶鲁格式。9以这种格式，每个元素在行中的位置以及数据都像以前一样存储。但是，如果我们假设同一列中的所有元素都相邻存储在计算机内存中，那么我们只需要存储有关每列中非零元素数量的信息，而不是它们的位置。因此，假设矩阵具有比矩阵中的列更多的非零元素，那么就使用的内存量而言，我们获胜。

trans-unit.source: The string <var>format</var> describes how the words in <var>str</var> should be parsed. As in <var>fscanf</var>, any (non-whitespace) text in the format that is not one of these specifiers is considered a literal. If there is a literal between two format specifiers then that same literal must appear in the input stream between the matching words.
trans-unit.target: 字符串 <var>format</var> 描述了应如何解析 <var>str</var> 中的单词。与 <var>fscanf</var> 中一样，格式不是这些说明符之一的任何（非空白）文本都被视为文字。如果两个格式说明符之间有一个文字，则该相同的文字必须出现在匹配单词之间的输入流中。

trans-unit.source: The string <var>format</var> describes how the words in <var>str</var> should be parsed. It may contain any combination of the following specifiers:

trans-unit.source: The string <var>str</var> is split into words that are repeatedly matched to the specifiers in <var>format</var>. The first word is matched to the first specifier, the second to the second specifier and so forth. If there are more words than specifiers, the process is repeated until all words have been processed.
trans-unit.target: 字符串 <var>str</var> 分为多个单词，这些单词与 <var>format</var> 的说明符重复匹配。第一个单词与第一个说明符匹配，第二个与第二个说明符匹配，依此类推。如果单词多于指定符，则重复该过程，直到处理完所有单词为止。

trans-unit.source: The string str or file associated with fid is read from and parsed according to format. The function is an extension of strread and textread. Differences include: the ability to read from either a file or a string, additional options, and additional format specifiers.

trans-unit.source: The string representation used by Octave is an array of characters, so internally the string "dddddddddd" is actually a row vector of length 10 containing the value 100 in all places (100 is the ASCII code of "d"). This lends itself to the obvious generalization to character matrices. Using a matrix of characters, it is possible to represent a collection of same-length strings in one variable. The convention used in Octave is that each row in a character matrix is a separate string, but letting each column represent a string is equally possible.
trans-unit.target: Octave使用的字符串表示形式是一个字符数组，因此在内部字符串 "dddddddddd" 实际上是一个长度为10的行向量，在所有位置都包含值100（100是 "d" 的ASCII码）。这有助于对字符矩阵进行明显的概括。使用字符矩阵，可以在一个变量中表示一组等长字符串。Octave中使用的约定是，字符矩阵中的每一行都是一个单独的字符串，但是让每一列代表一个字符串也是可能的。

trans-unit.source: The subscripts are defined by the rows of the matrix <var>subs</var> and the values by <var>vals</var>. If <var>subs</var> is a cell array of vectors, all vectors must be of the same length, and the subscripts in the <var>k</var>th vector must correspond to the <var>k</var>th dimension of the result.

trans-unit.source: The surface mesh is plotted using shaded rectangles. The vertices of the rectangles [x, y] are typically the output of meshgrid. over a 2-D rectangular region in the x-y plane. z determines the height above the plane of each vertex. If only a single z matrix is given, then it is plotted over the meshgrid x = 1:columns (z), y = 1:rows (z). Thus, columns of z correspond to different x values and rows of z correspond to different y values.

trans-unit.source: The two basic reasons to use sparse matrices are to reduce the memory usage and to not have to do calculations on zero elements. The two are closely related in that the computation time on a sparse matrix operator or function is roughly linear with the number of nonzero elements.

trans-unit.source: The underlying Fortran code should use the XSTOPX function to replace the Fortran STOP function. XSTOPX uses the Octave exception handler to treat failing cases in the Fortran code explicitly. Note that Octave supplies its own replacement BLASXERBLA function, which uses XSTOPX.
trans-unit.target: 底层的Fortran代码应使用 XSTOPX 函数替换Fortran STOP 函数。 XSTOPX 使用Octave异常处理程序在Fortran代码中显式处理失败的情况。请注意，Octave提供了自己的替代BLAS XERBLA 函数，该函数使用 XSTOPX 。

However, it should be noted that identifying the type of the matrix incorrectly will lead to unpredictable results, and so matrix_type should be used with care.

trans-unit.source: The value of history_control is a colon-separated list of values controlling how commands are saved on the history list. If the list of values includes ignorespace, lines which begin with a space character are not saved in the history list. A value of ignoredups causes lines matching the previous history entry to not be saved. A value of ignoreboth is shorthand for ignorespace and ignoredups. A value of erasedups causes all previous lines matching the current line to be removed from the history list before that line is saved. Any value not in the above list is ignored. If history_control is the empty string, all commands are saved on the history list, subject to the value of history_save.
trans-unit.target: history_control 的值是一个用冒号分隔的值列表，用于控制如何在历史记录列表中保存命令。如果值列表包含 ignorespace ，则以空格字符开头的行不会保存在历史记录列表中。 ignoredups 的值将导致不保存与上一个历史记录条目匹配的行。 ignoreboth 的值是 ignorespace 和 ignoredups 简写。 erasedups 值的值使与当前行匹配的所有先前行在保存该行之前从历史记录列表中删除。不在上面列表中的任何值都将被忽略。如果 history_control 是空字符串，所有命令均以 history_save 的值保存在历史列表中。

trans-unit.source: The values in c are scaled to span the range of the current colormap. Limits may be placed on the color axis by the command caxis, or by setting the clim property of the parent axis.
trans-unit.target: c 中的值被缩放以覆盖当前颜色图的范围。可以通过命令 caxis 或通过设置父轴的 clim 属性在颜色轴上设置限制。

trans-unit.target: 每个 <var>x</var> 值的多项式值。

trans-unit.source: The values of the vector field to plot.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的向量域的值。

trans-unit.source: The variable pos(1:2) defines the lower left-hand corner of the patch and pos(3:4) defines its width and height. By default, the value of pos is [0, 0, 1, 1].
trans-unit.target: 变量 pos(1:2) 定义了补丁的左下角，而 pos(3:4) 定义了补丁的宽度和高度。默认情况下， pos 的值为 [0, 0, 1, 1] 0，0，1，1 ]。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>curv</var> defines the curvature of the sides of the rectangle and may be a scalar or two-element vector with values between 0 and 1. A value of 0 represents no curvature of the side, whereas a value of 1 means that the side is entirely curved into the arc of a circle. If <var>curv</var> is a two-element vector, then the first element is the curvature along the x-axis of the patch and the second along y-axis.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>curv</var> 定义矩形边的曲率，并且可以是标量或两元素矢量，其值在0到1之间。值0表示该边没有曲率，而值1表示该边是曲率。完全弯曲成一个圆弧。如果 <var>curv</var> 是一个包含两个元素的矢量，则第一个元素是沿着贴片的x轴的曲率，第二个元素是沿y轴的曲率。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>k</var> is the constant of integration, which by default is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>k</var> 是积分常数，默认情况下设置为零。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>rootkey</var> must be a string with a valid root key identifier:
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>rootkey</var> 必须是具有有效根密钥标识符的字符串：

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>s</var> is accepted for compatibility but is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>s</var> 被接受以兼容，但是被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>success</var> is 1 if the download was successful, otherwise it is 0 in which case <var>message</var> contains an error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果下载成功，则变量 <var>success</var> 为1，否则为0，在这种情况下， <var>message</var> 包含错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>x</var> must be a strictly monotonic vector (either increasing or decreasing) of length <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>x</var> 必须是长度为 <var>n</var> 的严格单调矢量（递增或递减）。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>x</var> must be a vector of length <var>n</var>.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>x</var> 必须是长度为 <var>n</var> 的向量。

trans-unit.source: The variable <var>y</var> must be in the interval [0,1], while <var>a</var> and <var>b</var> must be real and strictly positive.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>y</var> 必须在[0,1]区间内，而 <var>a</var> 和 <var>b</var> 必须是实数且严格为正。

trans-unit.source: The variables <var>x</var> and <var>y</var> define the vertex pairs, and must therefore have the same shape. They can be either vectors or arrays. If they are arrays then the columns of <var>x</var> and <var>y</var> are treated separately and an area returned for each.
trans-unit.target: 变量 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 定义了顶点对，因此必须具有相同的形状。它们可以是向量或数组。如果它们是数组，则将 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 的列分别处理，并分别返回一个区域。

trans-unit.source: The variance is defined as
trans-unit.target: 差异定义为

trans-unit.source: The variant with no input and output argument is an alias for the function OCTAVE_VERSION provided for compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 没有输入和输出参数的变量是为兼容性提供的函数 OCTAVE_VERSION 的别名。

trans-unit.source: The vector <var>C</var> specifies the color of each tetrahedron as an index into the current colormap. The default value is 1:m where m is the number of tetrahedrons; the indices are scaled to map to the full range of the colormap. If there are more tetrahedrons than colors in the colormap then the values in <var>C</var> are cyclically repeated.
trans-unit.target: 向量 <var>C</var> 将每个四面体的颜色指定为当前色图的索引。默认值为1：m，其中m是四面体的数量；索引被缩放以映射到颜色表的整个范围。如果四面体的数量多于颜色图中的颜色，则循环重复 <var>C</var> 中的值。

trans-unit.source: The vector c specifies the autocovariances [gamma_0, …, gamma_t] from lag 0 to t, oldphi specifies the coefficients based on c(t-1) and oldv specifies the corresponding error.
trans-unit.target: 向量 c 指定从滞后0到 t 的自协方差 [gamma_0, …, gamma_t] ， oldphi 指定基于 c （ t -1）的系数，而 oldv 指定相应的误差。

trans-unit.source: The vector <var>t</var> provides an upper limit on the length of the integration. If the stopping condition is met, the vector <var>t_out</var> will be shorter than <var>t</var>, and the final element of <var>t_out</var> will be the point at which the stopping condition was met, and may not correspond to any element of the vector <var>t</var>.
trans-unit.target: 向量 <var>t</var> 提供积分长度的上限。如果满足停止条件，则向量 <var>t_out</var> 将小于 <var>t</var> ，并且 <var>t_out</var> 的最后元素将是满足停止条件的点，并且可能不对应于向量 <var>t</var> 的任何元素。

trans-unit.source: The vector argument specifying limits is optional, and additional string arguments may be used to specify various axis properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定限制的向量参数是可选的,附加的字符串参数可以用来指定各种轴属性。

trans-unit.source: The vector field is given by [u, v, w] and is defined over a rectangular grid given by [x, y, z]. The streamtubes start at the seed points [sx, sy, sz].
trans-unit.target: 向量场由 [u, v, w] 给出，并在由 [x, y, z] 给出的矩形网格上定义。流管从种子点 [sx, sy, sz] 。

trans-unit.source: The vector specifies the coordinates (x0,y0) of the origin of the annotation object, its width, and its height. The width and height may be negative, depending on the orientation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 向量指定注释对象的原点坐标(x0,y0)、宽度和高度。根据对象的方向,宽度和高度可能为负值。

trans-unit.source: The version is first split into numeric and character portions and then the parts are padded to be the same length (i.e., "1.1" would be padded to be "1.1.0" when being compared with "1.1.1", and separately, the character parts of the strings are padded with nulls).
trans-unit.target: 首先将版本分为数字部分和字符部分，然后将这些部分填充为相同的长度（即，与 "1.1.1" 进行比较时，会将 "1.1" 填充为 "1.1.0" ”），分别地，字符串的字符部分用null填充）。

trans-unit.source: The way to use a function is with a function call expression, which consists of the function name followed by a list of arguments in parentheses. trans-unit.source: The wireframe mesh is plotted using rectangles. The vertices of the rectangles [x, y] are typically the output of meshgrid. over a 2-D rectangular region in the x-y plane. z determines the height above the plane of each vertex. If only a single z matrix is given, then it is plotted over the meshgrid x = 1:columns (z), y = 1:rows (z). Thus, columns of z correspond to different x values and rows of z correspond to different y values.
trans-unit.target: 使用矩形绘制线框网格。矩形[ x ， y ] 的顶点通常是 meshgrid 的输出。在xy平面的二维矩形区域上。 z 确定每个顶点平面上方的高度。如果仅给出单个 z 矩阵，则将其绘制在网格 x = 1:columns (z), y = 1:rows (z) 。因此， z 的列对应于不同的 x 值， z 的行对应于不同的 y 值。

trans-unit.source: The word is parsed as a "quoted string". If the first character of the string is a double quote (") then the string includes everything until a matching double quote—including whitespace, delimiters, and end-of-line characters. If a pair of consecutive double quotes appears in the input, it is replaced in the output by a single double quote. For examples, the input "He said ""Hello""" would return the value ’He said "Hello"’.
trans-unit.target: 该词被解析为“引用字符串”。如果字符串的第一个字符是双引号（“），则字符串将包含所有内容，直到匹配的双引号为止，包括空格，定界符和行尾字符。如果输入中出现一对连续的双引号，例如，输入“他说“你好””会返回值“他说“你好””。

First, it must be a valid Octave function name and so must be a sequence of letters, digits, and underscores not starting with a digit. Second, as Octave uses the function name to define the filename it attempts to find the function in, the function name in the DEFUN_DLD macro must match the filename of the oct-file. Therefore, the above function should be in a file

trans-unit.source: There are a number of basic class methods that can (and should) be defined to allow the contents of the classes to be queried and set. The most basic of these is the disp method. The disp method is used by Octave whenever a class should be displayed on the screen. Usually this is the result of an Octave expression that doesn’t end with a semicolon. If this method is not defined, then Octave won’t print anything when displaying the contents of a class which can be confusing.
trans-unit.target: 可以（应该）定义许多基本的类方法，以允许查询和设置类的内容。其中最基本的是 disp 方法。该 disp 方法用于通过倍频每当类应该在屏幕上显示。通常，这是不以分号结尾的倍频程表达式的结果。如果未定义此方法，则在显示可能令人困惑的类的内容时，Octave将不会打印任何内容。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of functions available for checking to see if the elements of a matrix meet some condition, and for rearranging the elements of a matrix. For example, Octave can easily tell you if all the elements of a matrix are finite, or are less than some specified value. Octave can also rotate the elements, extract the upper- or lower-triangular parts, or sort the columns of a matrix.
trans-unit.target: 有很多函数可以用来检查矩阵的元素是否满足某些条件,以及重新排列矩阵的元素。例如,Octave可以很容易地告诉你一个矩阵的所有元素是否都是有限的,或者是否小于某个指定值。Octave还可以旋转元素,提取上三角或下三角部分,或对矩阵的列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of functions that allow information concerning sparse matrices to be obtained. The most basic of these is issparse that identifies whether a particular Octave object is in fact a sparse matrix.

trans-unit.source: There are currently three options for plotting in Octave: the external program gnuplot, the internal graphics engine using OpenGL coupled with either FLTK or Qt widgets. Gnuplot is a command-driven interactive function plotting program.
trans-unit.target: 目前在Octave中绘图有三种选择:外部程序gnuplot,内部图形引擎使用OpenGL与FLTK或Qt widgets结合。Gnuplot是一个命令驱动的交互式函数绘图程序。

trans-unit.source: There are many classes of mathematical problems which give rise to matrices, where a large number of the elements are zero. In this case it makes sense to have a special matrix type to handle this class of problems where only the nonzero elements of the matrix are stored. Not only does this reduce the amount of memory to store the matrix, but it also means that operations on this type of matrix can take advantage of the a priori knowledge of the positions of the nonzero elements to accelerate their calculations.
trans-unit.target: 有许多类数学问题都会产生矩阵,其中有大量的元素为零。在这种情况下,有一种特殊的矩阵类型来处理这类问题是有意义的,在这种情况下,只有矩阵的非零元素被存储。这不仅减少了存储矩阵的内存量,而且意味着对这类矩阵的操作可以利用非零元素位置的先验知识来加速计算。

trans-unit.source: There are many different formats for representing such data. Currently, only the two most popular, linear encoding and mu-law encoding, are supported by Octave. There is an excellent FAQ on audio formats by Guido van Rossum guido@cwi.nl which can be found at any FAQ ftp site, in particular in the directory
trans-unit.target: 有很多不同的格式来表示此类数据。当前，Octave仅支持两种最流行的线性编码和mu-law编码。有音频格式由Guido van Rossum的一个很好的常见问题guido@cwi.nl它可以在任何FAQ ftp站点在目录中找到，特别是

trans-unit.source: There are many different means of storing sparse matrix data. What all of the methods have in common is that they attempt to reduce the complexity and storage given a priori knowledge of the particular class of problems that will be solved. A good summary of the available techniques for storing sparse matrix is given by Saad 8. With full matrices, knowledge of the point of an element of the matrix within the matrix is implied by its position in the computers memory. However, this is not the case for sparse matrices, and so the positions of the nonzero elements of the matrix must equally be stored.
trans-unit.target: 存储稀疏矩阵数据有很多不同的方法。所有这些方法的共同点是，在事先了解将要解决的特定问题类别的前提下，它们试图降低复杂性和存储量。 Saad 8很好地总结了稀疏矩阵的可用存储技术。对于全矩阵，矩阵元素在计算机内存中的位置隐含了矩阵元素的点的知识。但是，对于稀疏矩阵则不是这种情况，因此必须平等地存储矩阵的非零元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: There are some important differences between the various interpolation methods. The "spline" method enforces that both the first and second derivatives of the interpolated values have a continuous derivative, whereas the other methods do not. This means that the results of the "spline" method are generally smoother. If the function to be interpolated is in fact smooth, then "spline" will give excellent results. However, if the function to be evaluated is in some manner discontinuous, then "pchip" interpolation might give better results.
trans-unit.target: 各种插值方法之间存在一些重要差异。在 "spline" 方法强制执行内插的值的所述第一和第二导数具有连续衍生物，而其它方法则没有。这意味着 "spline" 方法的结果通常更平滑。如果要插值的函数实际上是平滑的，则 "spline" 将给出出色的结果。但是，如果要评估的函数以某种方式不连续，则 "pchip" 插值可能会提供更好的结果。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes the functions that are available to allow you to get information about what is happening outside of Octave, while it is still running, and use this information in your program. For example, you can get information about environment variables, the current time, and even start other programs from the Octave prompt.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了一些可用的功能,这些功能可以让你在Octave还在运行的时候,获取Octave外部发生的信息,并在你的程序中使用这些信息。例如,你可以从Octave提示中获取环境变量、当前时间的信息,甚至可以启动其他程序。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes the signal processing and fast Fourier transform functions available in Octave. Fast Fourier transforms are computed with the <small>FFTW</small> or <small>FFTPACK</small> libraries depending on how Octave is built.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍八度中可用的信号处理和快速傅立叶变换功能。快速傅立叶变换是使用<small>FFTW</small>或<small>FFTPACK</small>库计算的，具体取决于八度的构建方式。

trans-unit.source: This chapter discusses the means of constructing a user class, how to query and set the properties of a class, and how to overload operators and functions. Throughout this chapter real code examples are given using a class designed for polynomials.
trans-unit.target: 本章讨论了构造用户类的方法,如何查询和设置类的属性,以及如何重载运算符和函数。在本章中,用一个为多项式设计的类给出了实际的代码示例。

trans-unit.source: This chapter discusses vectorization and other techniques for writing faster code.
trans-unit.target: 本章讨论了矢量化和其他技术,以便编写更快的代码。

trans-unit.source: This chapter documents the linear algebra functions provided in Octave. Reference material for many of these functions may be found in Golub and Van Loan,

trans-unit.source: This chapter explains some of Octave’s basic features, including how to start an Octave session, get help at the command prompt, edit the command line, and write Octave programs that can be executed as commands from your shell.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了Octave的一些基本功能，包括如何启动Octave会话，如何在命令提示符下获得帮助，编辑命令行以及编写可以从Shell作为命令执行的Octave程序。

trans-unit.source: This chapter illustrates user-defined classes and object oriented programming through a custom class designed for polynomials. This class was chosen for its simplicity which does not distract unnecessarily from the discussion of the programming features of Octave. Even so, a bit of background on the goals of the polynomial class is necessary before the syntax and techniques of Octave object oriented programming are introduced.
trans-unit.target: 本章通过一个为多项式设计的自定义类来说明用户定义的类和面向对象的编程。选择这个类是因为它的简单性不会不必要地分散对Octave编程特性的讨论。即便如此,在介绍Octave面向对象编程的语法和技术之前,有必要先了解一下多项式类的目标背景。

trans-unit.source: This code works by first evaluating the expression 3:10, to produce a range of values from 3 to 10 inclusive. Then the variable i is assigned the first element of the range and the body of the loop is executed once. When the end of the loop body is reached, the next value in the range is assigned to the variable i, and the loop body is executed again. This process continues until there are no more elements to assign.
trans-unit.target: 该代码的工作方式是首先对表达式 3:10 求值，以产生3到10（含）之间的值范围。然后，将变量 i 分配给范围的第一个元素，并且循环主体执行一次。当到达循环体的末尾时，范围内的下一个值将分配给变量 i ，并再次执行循环体。此过程将继续进行，直到没有其他要分配的元素为止。

trans-unit.source: This colormap gives a sepia tone when used on grayscale images.
trans-unit.target: 当使用在灰度图像上时,该彩色地图会呈现出深褐色的色调。

trans-unit.source: This colormap varies from black to white going though blue, green, and red tones while maintaining a monotonically increasing perception of intensity. This is achieved by traversing a color cube from black to white through a helix, hence the name cubehelix, while taking into account the perceived brightness of each channel according to the NTSC specifications from 1953.
trans-unit.target: 这个彩色图从黑到白经过蓝、绿、红三色,同时保持单调地增加感知强度。这是通过一个颜色立方体从黑到白通过螺旋线,因此被称为立方体螺旋线,同时根据1953年的NTSC规范考虑到每个通道的感知亮度来实现的。

trans-unit.source: This command fixes the camera’s viewing direction (camtarget() - campos()), camera up vector (see camup) and viewing angle (see camva). The camera target (see camtarget) and camera position (see campos) are changed.
trans-unit.target: 此命令固定相机的观看方向（ camtarget() - campos() ），相机向上矢量（请参见camup）和视角（请参见camva）。摄像机目标（请参见camtarget）和摄像机位置（请参见campos）已更改。

trans-unit.source: This command only affects the display of numbers, but not how they are stored or computed. To change the internal representation from the default double use one of the conversion functions such as single, uint8, int64, etc.
trans-unit.target: 此命令仅影响数字的显示，而不影响数字的存储或计算方式。要从默认的double更改内部表示，请使用转换函数之一，例如 single ， uint8 ， int64 等。

trans-unit.source: This creates a N-by-2 matrix nodes and a E-by-3 matrix elems with values, which define finite element triangles:
trans-unit.target: 这就形成了一个n乘2矩阵 nodes 和一个E-3矩阵 elems 的与值，其定义有限元三角形：

trans-unit.source: This creates a sparse matrix with the same structure as <var>S</var>.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个结构与 <var>S</var> 相同的稀疏矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This creates the same matrix as previously. Again, although not strictly necessary, it is significantly faster if the sparse matrix is created and the elements are added in column-major ordering. The reason for this is that when elements are inserted at the end of the current list of known elements then no element in the matrix needs to be moved to allow the new element to be inserted; Only the column indices need to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建与之前相同的矩阵。同样,虽然不是严格意义上的必要,但如果创建稀疏矩阵并按列-主排序添加元素,速度会明显加快。这样做的原因是,当元素被插入到当前已知元素列表的末尾时,矩阵中的任何元素都不需要移动,以便插入新的元素;只需要更新列索引。

trans-unit.source: This function changes the ambient, diffuse, and specular strengths, as well as the specular exponent and specular color reflectance, of all patch and surface objects in the current axes. trans-unit.source: This function is recursive because it calls itself directly. It eventually terminates because each time it calls itself, it uses an argument that is one less than was used for the previous call. Once the argument is no longer greater than zero, it does not call itself, and the recursion ends.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是递归的,因为它直接调用自己。它最终会终止,因为每次调用自己时,它使用的参数都比前一次调用时少一个。一旦参数不再大于0,它就不调用自己,递归结束。

trans-unit.source: This isn’t merely easier to write; it is also internally much easier to optimize. Octave delegates this operation to an underlying implementation which, among other optimizations, may use special vector hardware instructions or could conceivably even perform the additions in parallel. In general, if the code is vectorized, the underlying implementation has more freedom about the assumptions it can make in order to achieve faster execution.
trans-unit.target: 这不仅容易编写；它在内部也更容易优化。Octave将此操作委托给一个基础实现，该实现除了其他优化之外，还可以使用特殊的矢量硬件指令，或者甚至可以并行执行加法。通常，如果代码是矢量化的，则基础实现对其可以进行的假设具有更大的自由度，以实现更快的执行。

trans-unit.source: This section lists the built-in functions that are aware of diagonal and permutation matrices on input, or can return them as output. trans-unit.source: To avoid segmentation faults causing Octave to abort, this function explicitly checks that there are sufficient arguments available before accessing these arguments. It then obtains two multi-dimensional arrays of type NDArray and adds these together. Note that the array_value method is called without using the is_matrix_type method. If an error occurs when attempting to extract the value, Octave will print a message and throw an exception. The reason to prefer this coding structure is that the arguments might be a type which is not an NDArray, but for which it would make sense to convert them to one. The array_value method allows this conversion to be performed transparently when possible. If you need to catch errors like this, and perform some kind of cleanup or other operation, you can catch the octave_execution_error exception.
trans-unit.target: 为避免分段错误导致Octave中止，此函数在访问这些参数之前会明确检查是否有足够的参数可用。然后，获得两个 NDArray 类型的多维数组，并将它们加在一起。请注意，不使用 is_matrix_type 方法就调用 array_value 方法。如果尝试提取值时发生错误，Octave将打印一条消息并引发异常。之所以喜欢这种编码结构，是因为参数可能不是 NDArray ，而是将其转换为一个是有意义的类型。该 array_value 方法允许在可能的情况下透明地执行此转换。如果您需要捕获此类错误并执行某种清理或其他操作，则可以捕获 octave_execution_error 异常。

trans-unit.source: To be consistent with the Octave graphic handle classes, a class should also define the get and set methods. The get method accepts one or two arguments. The first argument is an object of the appropriate class. If no second argument is given then the method should return a structure with all the properties of the class. If the optional second argument is given it should be a property name and the specified property should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 为了与Octave图形句柄类保持一致，一个类还应该定义 get 和 set 方法。该 get 方法接受一个或两个参数。第一个参数是适当类的对象。如果未提供第二个参数，则该方法应返回具有该类所有属性的结构。如果给出了可选的第二个参数，则它应该是一个属性名称，并且应该检索指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: To be more clear, the approximation x is computed at the iteration (iter(1) - 1) * restart + iter(2). Since the output x corresponds to the minimal preconditioned residual solution, the total number of iterations that the method performed is given by length (resvec) - 1.
trans-unit.target: 更清楚地说，在迭代 (iter(1) - 1) * restart + iter(2) iter(1) -1）* restart + iter(2) 时计算近似值 x 。由于输出 x 对应于最小预处理残差解，因此该方法执行的迭代总数由 length (resvec) - 1 。

trans-unit.source: To partially solve the problem Octave uses a special optimization for user-defined subsasgn methods coded as m-files. When the method gets called as a result of the built-in assignment syntax (not a direct subsasgn call as shown above), i.e., x(1) = 1, AND if the subsasgn method is declared with identical input and output arguments, as in the example above, then Octave will ignore the copy of x inside the caller’s scope; therefore, any changes made to x during the method execution will directly affect the caller’s copy as well. This allows, for instance, defining a polynomial class where modifying a single element takes constant time.
trans-unit.target: 为了部分解决问题，Octave对编码为m文件的用户定义的 subsasgn 方法使用了特殊的优化。当该方法由于内置的​​赋值语法而 subsasgn 调用（不是如上所示的直接subsasgn调用）时，即 x(1) = 1 ，并且，如果 subsasgn 方法使用相同的输入和输出参数声明，则为在上面的示例中，Octave将忽略调用者范围内的 x 副本；因此，在方法执行期间对 x 所做的任何更改也会直接影响调用者的副本。例如，这允许定义多项式类，其中修改单个元素需要花费固定时间。

trans-unit.source: To post-increment a variable x, you would write x++. This adds one to the variable x, but returns the value that x had prior to incrementing it. For example, if x is equal to 2, the result of the expression x++ is 2, and the new value of x is 3.
trans-unit.target: 要后递增变量 x ，您可以编写 x++ 。这会将 x 加一个，但返回 x 递增之前的值。例如，如果 x 等于2，则表达式 x++ 的结果为2，而 x 的新值是3。

trans-unit.source: Transparency level of the faces of the patch object. Only double values are supported at present where a value of 0 means complete transparency and a value of 1 means solid faces without transparency. Setting the property to "flat" or "interp" causes the faces to not being rendered. Additionally, the faces are not sorted from back to front which might lead to unexpected results when rendering layered transparent faces.
trans-unit.target: 补丁对象的面的透明度级别。当前仅支持双精度值，其中0表示完全透明，而1表示没有透明的实体面。将属性设置为 "flat" 或 "interp" 会导致不渲染面。此外，这些面未从背面到正面进行排序，这在渲染分层透明面时可能会导致意外结果。

trans-unit.source: Transparency level of the faces of the surface object. Only double values are supported at present where a value of 0 means complete transparency and a value of 1 means solid faces without transparency. Setting the property to "flat", "interp" or "texturemap" causes the faces to not being rendered. Additionally, the faces are not sorted from back to front which might lead to unexpected results when rendering layered transparent faces.
trans-unit.target: 曲面对象的面的透明度级别。当前仅支持双精度值，其中0表示完全透明，而1表示没有透明的实体面。将属性设置为 "flat" ， "interp" 或 "texturemap" 会导致不渲染面。此外，这些面未从背面到正面进行排序，这在渲染分层透明面时可能会导致意外结果。

trans-unit.source: Two permutation matrices can be multiplied or divided (if their sizes match), performing a composition of permutations. Also a permutation matrix can be indexed by a permutation vector (or two vectors), giving again a permutation matrix. Any other operations do not generally yield a permutation matrix and will thus trigger the implicit conversion.
trans-unit.target: 两个换元矩阵可以相乘或相除(如果它们的大小匹配),进行换元组合。也可以用一个换元向量(或两个向量)对换元矩阵进行索引,再次得到一个换元矩阵。其他任何操作一般都不会得到一个换元矩阵,因此会触发隐式转换。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a function file, a script file must not begin with the keyword function. If it does, Octave will assume that it is a function file, and that it defines a single function that should be evaluated as soon as it is defined.
trans-unit.target: 与功能文件不同，脚本文件不能以关键字 function 开头。如果是这样，Octave将假定它是一个功能文件，并且它定义了一个应在定义后立即求值的功能。

trans-unit.source: Unlike many other computer languages, Octave allows you to define functions that return more than one value. The syntax for defining functions that return multiple values is
trans-unit.target: 与其他许多计算机语言不同,Octave允许您定义返回多个值的函数。定义返回多个值的函数的语法为

trans-unit.source: Unlike most languages, functions in Octave may return multiple values. For example, the following statement
trans-unit.target: 与大多数语言不同,Octave中的函数可以返回多个值。例如,下面的语句

trans-unit.source: Unlike most programming languages, complex numeric constants are denoted as the sum of real and imaginary parts. The imaginary part is denoted by a real-valued numeric constant followed immediately by a complex value indicator (‘
trans-unit.target: 与大多数编程语言不同，复杂的数字常量表示为实部和虚部的总和。虚部用实数值常量表示，后跟复数值指示符（“

trans-unit.source: Unlike the return statement in C, Octave’s return statement cannot be used to return a value from a function. Instead, you must assign values to the list of return variables that are part of the function statement. The return statement simply makes it easier to exit a function from a deeply nested loop or conditional statement.
trans-unit.target: 与C语言中的 return 语句不同，Octave的 return 语句不能用于从函数返回值。而是必须将值分配给 function 语句一部分的返回变量列表。在 return 语句只是可以更容易地从一个深度嵌套的循环或条件语句退出功能。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the C library function, which requires you to provide a suitably sized string as an argument, Octave’s sprintf function returns the string, automatically sized to hold all of the items converted.
trans-unit.target: 与C库函数要求您提供适当大小的字符串作为参数不同，Octave的 sprintf 函数返回该字符串，并自动调整大小以容纳所有转换后的项目。

trans-unit.source: Use cellfun intelligently. The cellfun function is a useful tool for avoiding loops. It is often used with anonymous function handles; however, calling an anonymous function involves an overhead quite comparable to the overhead of an m-file function. Passing a handle to a built-in function is faster, because the interpreter is not involved in the internal loop. For example:
trans-unit.target: 聪明地使用 cellfun 。该 cellfun 功能是避免环路的有用工具。它通常与匿名函数句柄一起使用。但是，调用匿名函数所产生的开销与m文件函数所产生的开销相当。将句柄传递给内置函数的速度更快，因为解释器不参与内部循环。例如：

trans-unit.source: Use ignore_function_time_stamp when appropriate. If you are calling lots of functions, and none of them will need to change during your run, set the variable ignore_function_time_stamp to "all". This will stop Octave from checking the time stamp of a function file to see if it has been updated while the program is being run.
trans-unit.target: 适当时使用 ignore_function_time_stamp 。如果您要调用许多函数，并且在运行期间无需更改任何函数，请将变量 ignore_function_time_stamp 设置为 "all" 。这将使Octave停止检查功能文件的时间戳，以查看程序运行时是否已对其进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Use pdfcrop if you don’t want the surrounding page.

trans-unit.target: 使用 <var>fontname</var> 和/或 <var>fontsize</var> 所有文本。 <var>fontname</var> 被用于某些设备忽略：DXF，无花果，HPGL等

trans-unit.source: Use built-in and library functions if possible. Built-in and compiled functions are very fast. Even with an m-file library function, chances are good that it is already optimized, or will be optimized more in a future release.

trans-unit.source: Use only the lower triangle of A and return a lower triangular factor L such that L*L' approximates A.

trans-unit.source: Use the "string" property to change the text string. trans-unit.source: Use the "string" property to change the text string. trans-unit.source: Using a first order FEM, we approximate the electrical conductivity distribution in Omega as constant on each simplex (represented by the vector conductivity). Based on the finite element geometry, we first calculate a system (or stiffness) matrix for each simplex (represented as 3-by-3 elements on the diagonal of the element-wise system matrix SE). Based on SE and a N-by-DE connectivity matrix C, representing the connections between simplices and vertices, the global connectivity matrix S is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 使用一阶有限元法，我们将欧米茄的电导率分布近似为每个单形上的常数（由矢量 conductivity 表示）。基于有限元几何，我们首先为每个单纯形计算一个系统（或刚度）矩阵（在元素方式系统矩阵 SE 的对角线上表示为3×3元素）。基于 SE 和代表单纯形和顶点之间的连接的N-by-DE连接矩阵 C ，计算全局连接矩阵 S 。

trans-unit.source: Using zero as an increment in the colon notation, as 1:0:1 is not allowed, because a division by zero would occur in determining the number of range elements. However, ranges with zero increment (i.e., all elements equal) are useful, especially in indexing, and Octave allows them to be constructed using the built-in function ones. Note that because a range must be a row vector, ones (1, 10) produces a range, while ones (10, 1) does not.
trans-unit.target: 不允许使用零作为冒号表示的增量，因为 1:0:1 是不允许的，因为在确定范围元素的数量时会被零除。但是，具有零增量的范围（即，所有元素相等）是有用的，尤其是在索引编制中，并且Octave允许使用内置函数“ ones 来构造它们。请注意，因为范围必须是行向量，所以 ones (1, 10) 会产生范围，而 ones (10, 1) 不会。

trans-unit.source: Variables in Octave do not have fixed types, so it is possible to first store a numeric value in a variable and then to later use the same name to hold a string value in the same program. Variables may not be used before they have been given a value. Doing so results in an error.

trans-unit.source: Variables let you give names to values and refer to them later. You have already seen variables in many of the examples. The name of a variable must be a sequence of letters, digits and underscores, but it may not begin with a digit. trans-unit.source: Vectorization and Faster Code Execution
trans-unit.target: 矢量化和更快的代码执行速度

trans-unit.source: Vectorization is a programming technique that uses vector operations instead of element-by-element loop-based operations. Besides frequently producing more succinct Octave code, vectorization also allows for better optimization in the subsequent implementation. The optimizations may occur either in Octave’s own Fortran, C, or C++ internal implementation, or even at a lower level depending on the compiler and external numerical libraries used to build Octave. The ultimate goal is to make use of your hardware’s vector instructions if possible or to perform other optimizations in software.
trans-unit.target: 向量化是一种使用向量运算而非基于逐个元素的循环的运算的编程技术。除了经常产生更简洁的Octave代码外，矢量化还允许在后续实现中进行更好的优化。优化可能在Octave自己的Fortran，C或C ++内部实现中进行，甚至可能在较低级别进行，具体取决于用于构建Octave的编译器和外部数值库。最终目标是在可能的情况下利用硬件的矢量指令或在软件中执行其他优化。

trans-unit.source: Vectorization is not a concept unique to Octave, but it is particularly important because Octave is a matrix-oriented language. Vectorized Octave code will see a dramatic speed up (10X–100X) in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 向量化不是Octave独有的概念，但它特别重要，因为Octave是面向矩阵的语言。在大多数情况下，矢量化倍频程代码的速度将大大提高（10X–100X）。

trans-unit.source: Vectorization is the preferred technique for eliminating loops and speeding up code. Nevertheless, it is not always possible to replace every loop. In such situations it may be worth trying Octave’s experimental Just-In-Time (JIT) compiler.
trans-unit.target: 向量化是消除循环并加快代码速度的首选技术。但是，并非总是可以替换每个循环。在这种情况下，值得尝试使用Octave的实验性即时（JIT）编译器。

trans-unit.source: When method is "gaussian", std_dev defines the standard deviation of the trivariate normal distribution function. std_dev is either a vector of 3 elements representing the standard deviation of the Gaussian convolution kernel in x-, y- and z-directions or a scalar, in which case the same value is used in all three dimensions. The default value is 0.65.
trans-unit.target: 当 method 为 "gaussian" ， std_dev 定义三变量正态分布函数的标准偏差。 std_dev 是3个元素的矢量，代表3个元素在x，y和z方向上的高斯卷积核的标准偏差，或者是标量，在这种情况下，所有三个维度均使用相同的值。默认值为0.65。

trans-unit.source: When mode is unspecified return the Cholesky factorization for R. If mode is "lower" or "L" then return the conjugate transpose R' which is a lower triangular factor. The conjugate transpose version is faster and uses less memory, but still returns the same values for all other outputs: count, h, parent, and post.
trans-unit.target: 当 mode 是不确定的回报Cholesky分解为 R 。如果 mode 为 "lower" 或 "L" 则返回共轭转置 R' ，它是较低的三角因子。共轭转置版本速度更快且使用的内存更少，但对于其他所有输出仍返回相同的值： count ， h ， parent 和 post 。

trans-unit.source: When <var>mu</var> is present, evaluate the polynomial for (<var>x</var>-<var>mu</var>(1)) / <var>mu</var>(2).

trans-unit.source: When <var>n</var> is positive, the dimensions of <var>x</var> are shifted to the left, with the leading dimensions circulated to the end. If <var>n</var> is negative, then the dimensions of <var>x</var> are shifted to the right, with <var>n</var> leading singleton dimensions added.
trans-unit.target: 当 <var>n</var> 为正数时， <var>x</var> 的尺寸向左移动，而前导尺寸循环到末端。如果 <var>n</var> 为负，则 <var>x</var> 的尺寸会向右移动，并添加 <var>n</var> 个前导单例尺寸。

trans-unit.source: When str is a character string to be tested, and strarray is a cellstr of valid values, then validstr will be the validated form of str where validation is defined as str being a member or substring of validstr. This is useful for both verifying and expanding short options, such as "r", to their longer forms, such as "red". If str is a substring of validstr, and there are multiple matches, the shortest match will be returned if all matches are substrings of each other. Otherwise, an error will be raised because the expansion of str is ambiguous. All comparisons are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 当 str 是要测试的字符串，并且 strarray 是有效值的单元格strstr时， validstr 将是 str 的有效形式，其中validation定义为 str 是 validstr 的成员或子字符串。这对于将短选项（例如 "r" 验证和扩展为较长的形式（例如 "red" 都是有用的。如果 str 是 validstr 的子字符串，并且有多个匹配项，则如果所有匹配项都是彼此的子字符串，则将返回最短的匹配项。否则会因为 str 的扩展而产生错误是模棱两可的。所有比较都不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: When x is a vector, the function counts the number of elements of x that fall in the histogram bins defined by edges. This must be a vector of monotonically increasing values that define the edges of the histogram bins. n(k) contains the number of elements in x for which edges(k) <= x < edges(k+1). The final element of n contains the number of elements of x exactly equal to the last element of edges.
trans-unit.target: 当 x 是向量时，该函数计算落入 edges 定义的直方图bin中的 x 元素的数量。它必须是定义直方图块边缘的单调递增值的向量。 n(k) （k）包含 x 中 edges(k) <= x < edges(k+1) （k）<= x < edges （k + 1）的元素数。 n 的最后一个元素包含 x 的元素的数量完全等于 edges 的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: When x is an N-dimensional array, the computation is carried out along dimension dim. If not specified dim defaults to the first non-singleton dimension.
trans-unit.target: 当 x 是N维数组时，计算是沿 dim 进行的。如果未指定， dim 默认为第一个非单维度。

trans-unit.source: When Ghostscript output is sent to a printer the size is determined by the figure’s "papersize" property. When the output is sent to a file the size is determined by the plot box defined by the figure’s "paperposition" property.
trans-unit.target: 当Ghostscript输出发送到打印机时，大小由图形的 "papersize" 属性确定。将输出发送到文件时，大小由图形的 "paperposition" 属性定义的绘图框确定。

trans-unit.source: When Octave defines a function from a function file, it saves the full name of the file it read and the time stamp on the file. If the time stamp on the file changes, Octave may reload the file. When Octave is running interactively, time stamp checking normally happens at most once each time Octave prints the prompt. Searching for new function definitions also occurs if the current working directory changes.
trans-unit.target: 当Octave从函数文件中定义一个函数时,它会保存读取的文件全名和文件上的时间戳。如果文件上的时间戳发生变化,Octave可能会重新加载文件。当Octave交互式运行时,时间戳检查通常在Octave每次打印提示时最多进行一次。如果当前工作目录发生变化,也会搜索新的函数定义。

trans-unit.source: When Octave encounters an identifier that is undefined, it first looks for variables or functions that are already compiled and currently listed in its symbol table. If it fails to find a definition there, it searches a list of directories (the path) for files ending in
trans-unit.target: 当Octave遇到未定义的标识符时，它将首先查找已编译且当前在其符号表中列出的变量或函数。如果无法在此处找到定义，则会在目录列表（路径）中搜索以结尾的文件

trans-unit.source: When Octave encounters the keyword return inside a function or script, it returns control to the caller immediately. At the top level, the return statement is ignored. A return statement is assumed at the end of every function definition.
trans-unit.target: 当Octave 在函数或脚本中遇到关键字 return 时，它将立即将控制权返回给调用者。在顶层，return语句将被忽略。在每个函数定义的末尾都假定有 return 语句。

trans-unit.source: When Octave is used interactively, stdin is filtered through the command line editing functions.
trans-unit.target: 当交互式使用Octave时,通过命令行编辑功能对stdin进行过滤。

trans-unit.source: When Octave parses a matrix expression, it examines the elements of the list to determine whether they are all constants. If they are, it replaces the list with a single matrix constant.
trans-unit.target: 当Octave解析一个矩阵表达式时,它会检查列表中的元素,以确定它们是否都是常量。如果是,它就用一个矩阵常数替换列表。

trans-unit.source: When Octave parses a range expression, it examines the elements of the expression to determine whether they are all constants. If they are, it replaces the range expression with a single range constant.
trans-unit.target: 当Octave解析一个范围表达式时,它会检查表达式中的元素,以确定它们是否都是常数。如果它们都是,它就用一个范围常数替换范围表达式。

trans-unit.source: When Octave starts, it looks for commands to execute from the files in the following list. These files may contain any valid Octave commands, including function definitions.
trans-unit.target: 当Octave启动时,它会从下面列表中的文件中查找要执行的命令。这些文件可以包含任何有效的Octave命令,包括函数定义。

trans-unit.source: When a matching failure occurs, scanf returns immediately, leaving the first non-matching character as the next character to be read from the stream, and scanf returns all the items that were successfully converted.
trans-unit.target: 当发生匹配失败时， scanf 立即返回，将第一个不匹配字符保留为要从流中读取的下一个字符， scanf 返回所有已成功转换的项目。

trans-unit.source: When a colon is used in the special case of 1-D indexing the result is always a column vector. Creating column vectors with a colon index is a very frequently encountered code idiom and is faster and generally clearer than calling reshape for this case.
trans-unit.target: 在一维索引的特殊情况下使用冒号时，结果始终是列向量。使用冒号索引创建列向量是一种非常常见的代码习惯用法，比在这种情况下调用 reshape 更快，更清晰。

trans-unit.source: When a file is re-parsed, such as when it is modified outside the GUI, all breakpoints within the file are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 当一个文件被重新解析时,比如在GUI外修改时,文件内的所有断点都会被清除。

trans-unit.source: When a function is called, Octave searches a list of directories for a file that contains the function declaration. This list of directories is known as the load path. By default the load path contains a list of directories distributed with Octave plus the current working directory. To see your current load path call the path function without any input or output arguments.
trans-unit.target: 调用函数时，Octave在目录列表中搜索包含函数声明的文件。此目录列表称为加载路径。默认情况下，加载路径包含使用Octave分发的目录列表以及当前工作目录。要查看当前的加载路径，请调用没有任何输入或输出参数的 path 函数。

trans-unit.source: When a light object is present in an axes object, and the properties "EdgeLighting" or "FaceLighting" of a patch or surface object are set to a value other than "none", these objects are drawn with lighting effects. Supported values for Lighting properties are "none" (no lighting effects), "flat" (faceted look of the objects), and "gouraud" (linear interpolation of the lighting effects between the vertices). If the lighting mode is set to "flat", the "FaceNormals" property is used for lighting. For "gouraud", the "VertexNormals" property is used.
trans-unit.target: 当光对象存在于一个轴对象，并且属性 "EdgeLighting" 或 "FaceLighting" 一个的 patch 或 surface 对象被设定为比其它的值 "none" ，这些目的绘制的照明效果。照明属性的支持值为 "none" （无照明效果）， "flat" （对象的多面外观）和 "gouraud" （顶点之间的照明效果的线性插值）。如果将照明模式设置为 "flat" ，则将 "FaceNormals" 属性用于照明。对于 "gouraud" ，即 "VertexNormals" 属性被使用。

trans-unit.source: When a local variable name, which is linked to a global variable, is cleared only the local copy of the variable is removed. The global copy is untouched and can be restored with global global_varname. Conversely, clear -g global_varname will remove both the local and global variables.
trans-unit.target: 清除链接到全局变量的本地变量名称后，仅删除该变量的本地副本。全局副本未 global global_varname ，可以使用global global_varname进行还原。相反， clear -g global_varname 将同时删除局部变量和全局变量。

trans-unit.source: When a second output argument is requested an index matrix is also returned. The <var>idx</var> matrix has the same size as <var>x</var>. Each element of <var>idx</var> contains the index of the histogram bin in which the corresponding element of <var>x</var> was counted.
trans-unit.target: 当请求第二个输出参数时，也会返回索引矩阵。的 <var>idx</var> 矩阵具有大小为相同的 <var>x</var> 。 <var>idx</var> 的每个元素都包含直方图bin的索引，其中 <var>x</var> 的相应元素已在其中进行计数。

trans-unit.source: When applied to an array (possibly multi-dimensional) with n columns, fcn may return a result in either of two formats: Format 1) an array of size 1-by-n-by-dim3-by-…-by-dimN. This is the typical output format from Octave core functions. Type demo ("movfun", 5) for an example of this use case. Format 2) a row vector of length n * numel_higher_dims where numel_higher_dims is prod (size (x)(3:end)). The output of fcn for the i-th input column must be found in the output at indices i:n:(n*numel_higher_dims). This format is useful when concatenating functions into arrays, or when using nthargout. Type demo ("movfun", 6) for an example of this case.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于阵列（可能多维的）与 n 列， fcn 格式1）的大小为1逐阵列：可以以两种格式返回结果 n -by- dim3 -by- ... -by- dimN 。这是Octave核心功能的典型输出格式。键入 demo ("movfun", 5) 作为该用例的示例。格式2）长度为 n * numel_higher_dims 的行向量，其中 numel_higher_dims 是 prod (size (x)(3:end)) 。第i个输入列的 fcn 输出必须在输出的索引 i:n:(n*numel_higher_dims) 。当将函数连接到数组中或使用 nthargout 时，此格式很有用。键入 demo ("movfun", 6) 作为这种情况的示例。

trans-unit.source: When called from a class constructor, mark the object currently constructed as having a higher precedence than <var>class_name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从类构造函数调用时，将当前构造的对象标记为具有比 <var>class_name</var> 更高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: When called from a class constructor, mark the object currently constructed as having a lower precedence than <var>class_name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 从类构造函数调用时，将当前构造的对象标记为具有比 <var>class_name</var> 更低的优先级。

trans-unit.source: When called from an m-file function, the error is prefixed with the name of the caller function.
trans-unit.target: 当从m-file函数中调用时,错误的前缀是调用者函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: When called from inside a function with the "local" option, the variable is changed locally for the function and any subroutines it calls. The original variable value is restored when exiting the function.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 "local" 选项从函数内部调用时，该变量及其所调用的任何子例程都会在本地更改。退出函数时，将恢复原始变量值。

trans-unit.source: When called this function returns values like this
trans-unit.target: 当调用这个函数时,会返回这样的值

trans-unit.source: When called with "KeyType" and "ValueType" arguments, create an empty map with the specified types. The inputs kt and vt are the types for the keys and values of the map respectively. Allowed values for kt are "char", "double", "single", "int32", "uint32", "int64", "uint64". Allowed values for vt are "any", "char", "double", "single", "int32", "uint32", "int64", "uint64", "logical".
trans-unit.target: 当使用 "KeyType" 和 "ValueType" 参数调用时，创建具有指定类型的空映射。输入 kt 和 vt 分别是映射的键和值的类型。有关允许值， kt 是 "char" ， "double" ， "single" ， "int32" ， "uint32" “ "int64" ， "uint64" 。有关允许值， vt 是 "any" ， "char" ， "double" ， "single" ， "int32" ， "uint32" ， "int64" ， "uint64" ， "logical" 。

trans-unit.source: When called with a character string <var>name</var>, return the numeric value of errno which corresponds to the specified error code. If <var>name</var> is not a recognized error code then -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当使用字符串 <var>name</var> 调用时，返回errno的数值，该数值对应于指定的错误代码。如果 <var>name</var> 不是可识别的错误代码，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: When called with a complex-valued argument, the function f returns the data structure containing the real and imaginary parts of the original function argument.
trans-unit.target: 当使用复数值参数调用时，函数 f 返回包含原始函数参数的实部和虚部的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: When called with a list of parameter/value pairs, return an options structure with only the named parameters initialized.
trans-unit.target: 当调用参数/值对列表时,返回一个只初始化了命名参数的选项结构。

trans-unit.source: When called with a numeric input <var>val</var>, set the current value of errno to the specified value. The previous value of errno is returned as <var>err</var>.
trans-unit.target: 当使用数字输入 <var>val</var> 调用时，将errno的当前值设置为指定值。errno的先前值作为 <var>err</var> 返回。

trans-unit.source: When called with a second output argument, return the handle of the figure containing the object whose callback is currently executing. If no callback is executing the second output is also set to the empty matrix.
trans-unit.target: 当调用第二个输出参数时,返回包含当前回调正在执行的对象的图的句柄。如果没有回调在执行,第二个输出也被设置为空矩阵。

trans-unit.source: When called with a single argument <var>h</var> which is a handle to an existing uibuttongroup object, switch the focus to the specified uibuttongroup. This functionality is not currently implemented.
trans-unit.target: 当使用单个参数 <var>h</var> (它是现有uibuttongroup对象的句柄）调用时，将焦点切换到指定的uibuttongroup。当前未实现此功能。

trans-unit.source: When called with a single argument h which is a handle to an existing uicontrol object, switch the keyboard focus to the specified uicontrol. As a result, the uicontrol object will receive keyboard events that can be processed using the "keypressfcn" callback.
trans-unit.target: 当使用单个参数 h (它是现有uicontrol对象的句柄）调用时，将键盘焦点切换到指定的uicontrol。结果，uicontrol对象将接收可以使用 "keypressfcn" 回调处理的键盘事件。
